title: 3 in 4 adults around the world say they would get a COVID-19 vaccine
description: A new Ipsos survey shows that 74% of adults worldwide are interested in getting a COVID-19 vaccine when - and if - one becomes available.
cleaned_text: 4 adults around the world say they would get a COVID-19 vaccine Respondents from China were the most likely to say they'd get a vaccine once available.
